it.polimi.sw2019.model

Class Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.model.Factory

  • public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius this class was written to call its methods to create the board, the powerup, weapon and ammoTile decks; by reading JSON files

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Factory()
      Default Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<AmmoTile> createAmmoDeck()
      this method creates the ammoTiles deck by reading every kind of ammoTile from a file json and using AmmoTileFactory class
      Board createBoard(java.lang.String fileName, java.util.List<Player> players)
      this method is called by the initialize match and creates the board by reading its correspondent json file THIS METHOD DOES NOT SET THE "PLAYERS" ATTRIBUTE IN THE ROOMS, IT MUST BE DONE IN MATCH CLASS AND DOES NOT SET THE "KILLTRACK"
      java.util.List<Powerup> createPowerupDeck()
      this method read the name of every file json correspondent to a powerup from the "powerupsDictionary" and calls the method that creates the arrayList of every copy of that powerup
      Weapon createWeapon(java.lang.String fileName)
      this method creates the weapon class by reading the correspondent json file
      java.util.List<Weapon> createWeaponDeck()
      This method creates the weapons deck by reading every weapon json file using the weaponsDictionary file
      Visibility getVisibilityClass() 
      void setVisibilityClass(Visibility visibilityClass)

        public java.util.List<Weapon> createWeaponDeck()
        This method creates the weapons deck by reading every weapon json file using the weaponsDictionary file

      • createWeapon

        public Weapon createWeapon(java.lang.String fileName)
        this method creates the weapon class by reading the correspondent json file
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name
        Returns:
        weapon

      • createPowerupDeck

        public java.util.List<Powerup> createPowerupDeck()
        this method read the name of every file json correspondent to a powerup from the "powerupsDictionary" and calls the method that creates the arrayList of every copy of that powerup
        Returns:
        the ArrayList associated to the powerups deck.

      • createAmmoDeck

        public java.util.List<AmmoTile> createAmmoDeck()
        this method creates the ammoTiles deck by reading every kind of ammoTile from a file json and using AmmoTileFactory class
        Returns:
        list of ammo tiles

      • createBoard

        public Board createBoard(java.lang.String fileName,
                         java.util.List<Player> players)
        this method is called by the initialize match and creates the board by reading its correspondent json file THIS METHOD DOES NOT SET THE "PLAYERS" ATTRIBUTE IN THE ROOMS, IT MUST BE DONE IN MATCH CLASS AND DOES NOT SET THE "KILLTRACK"
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the json file correspondent to the kind of board chosen by logged client
        players - list of the players
        Returns:
        board created
